skins.Name: Lunar Fang
skins.Description: A sword forged from the light of the moon, ready to pierce through darkness.

skins.Name: Moonlight Edge
skins.Description: A rare blade blessed by lunar magic, glowing faintly in the dark.

skins.Name: Celestial Strike
skins.Description: An epic sword, crackling with celestial energy and moonlight power.

skins.Name: Moonlit Fury
skins.Description: A legendary blade wielded by warriors of the moon, glowing with ethereal strength.

skins.Name: Tidebringer
skins.Description: A mythical sword that commands the tides, infused with lunar power.

skins.Name: Nightfall's Embrace
skins.Description: A blade forged under the stars, infused with the spirit of the night sky.

skins.Name: Lunar Eclipse
skins.Description: An ancient weapon, glowing with a deep blue lunar aura, the symbol of an ancient power.

skins.Name: Moon Goddess' Blade
skins.Description: A powerful sword forged by the moon goddess herself, filled with divine power.

skins.Name: Lunar Sovereign
skins.Description: The ultimate lunar blade, radiating with pure celestial energy and unmatched power.
